properties.description:
Manufacture of glass jars and bottles located in Seattle, Washington. Glass here is made with at least 50% recycled glass sourced locally with the other raw materials being sourced in the northwest region of North America. Natural gas from Canada fuels the factory's furnace and operations. 

http://us.verallia.com/contact-us/locations
